description: small upright stone monument at water's edge with triangular top with a sculpture of a crouching figure; figure with oar in back of boat at left; tree in URQ; city buildings in distance
inscription:
Signature and Inscription

on back, in pencil: [Ur 24]
provenance: [Colnaghi Prints Limited, London, until 1986; sold in February for PPOO, to Harry Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1986-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: bottom center, in the plate: [A. C.]
title: The Little Monument, from Vedute
